name: Grape Inferno
description: Grape Inferno is a 70/30 indica-dominant strain bred by NorStar Genetics and propagated by TGA Genetics. A cross between Nepali OG and Querkle, Grape Inferno inherits a dense bud structure and a sweet grape aroma from which this strain gets its name. With flavorful undertones of hash and berries, Grape Inferno delivers a meditative and calming high that lets the body relax while the mind wanders. Its buds bloom in a colorful show of lavender, pink, red, and green.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Hungry, Focused, Happy, Insomnia, Pain, Stress, Depression, Inflammation, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Anxious
